Footer.Description: Your space for wellness and balance in the heart of the city. Personalized therapies for body and mind.

Quotes.quote: After months of back pain, Lua's therapeutic massages have been my salvation. The atmosphere is relaxing and the therapists’ professionalism is exceptional.
Quotes.author: - María Fernández

Quotes.quote: I come regularly to keep work stress at bay. The combination of techniques and personalized care make each session a unique experience.
Quotes.author: - Carlos Rodríguez

Quotes.quote: As an athlete, Lua’s sports massages are a key part of my training routine. They’ve improved my performance and helped prevent injuries.
Quotes.author: - Laura Martínez

Cards.title: Lux Massage

Cards.title: Delux Massage

Cards.title: Luxury Delux
Cards.description: Very sensual and complete massage, stimulating key areas for total body relaxation (interactive, touch allowed). Includes erotic shower and prostate massage upon request.

Carrousel.Title: Welcome to Lua Massage
Carrousel.Description: Erotic massages and sensual therapies in an exclusive setting.

About.Title: Exclusive Erotic Massages
About.Subtitle: An intimate and personalized experience for your well-being.
Paragraphs: In each session, I invite you to enjoy a unique moment, designed to connect with your pleasure, relax your body and mind, and release tension through conscious and sensual touch.
This service is for people looking to experience something different with full discretion, no rush, and in an environment where every detail is designed for your comfort and pleasure.

Gallery.Title: Gallery
Gallery.Description: Discover our wellness space and the unique experiences we offer in every session.

AboutUs.Title: About Us
AboutUs.Description: Learn who we are and why Lua Massage is your exclusive wellness space in Valencia.
Paragraphs: Lua Massage offers professional massage services in a private and discreet setting in the heart of Valencia, Spain.
We specialize in relaxing and tantra-inspired therapies designed to offer a deeply calming and intimate experience to clients who value privacy and comfort.
Whether you're looking to release tension, reconnect with your senses, or simply escape daily stress, our space is designed for you.

Cookie.Message: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. You can accept or reject the use of non-essential cookies.
